meanings.definition: A type of sword with a curved blade.
meanings.sent1: The knights wielded falchions in battle.
meanings.sent2: Legends speak of warriors skilled in the art of wielding falchions.
meanings.sent3: The blacksmith mistakenly crafted falchions with wavy blades, causing laughter in the village.
meanings.sent4: His words were sharp as falchions, cutting through the silence of the room.
meanings.sent5: The glint of falchions in the sunlight struck fear into the hearts of their enemies.
